title: Pair of Sleeves
description: indigo, red; central embroidered band encircles sleeve:  red with yellow, green, white, black key, diamond motifs; band ends with triangles (pointed) of narrow, multicolored motifs; narrow band (1\") of multicolored embroidery at lower edge of sleeve opening; all bands applied after embroidery
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
